content: Hello! This is the reception bot for XYZ home services. How may I assist you today? We provide plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services.
Uh, I think I dialed the wrong number. I wasn't trying to call a home service company.
No problem! If you don't need any plumbing, electrical, or HVAC assistance, I can mark this as a wrong number and end the conversation for you. Would you like me to do that?
Yes, please mark it as a wrong number. Thanks!
Thanks for letting me know. I'll update our records accordingly. Have a great day!
reason: Customer confirmed wrong number, ending conversation.
